column1: Is the moon made of cheese?
column2: NASA strongly denies it%true|Only if you believe in dairy-based astronomy%false|Yes, and mice are planning a mission%false
Only when you're saying something dramatic%false|Scientists are still debating this%true|Yes, especially gossip%false
Yes, but only to next Monday’s meeting%false|Physicists haven’t agreed yet%true|Only if you forget your lunch%false
It’s a mystery of the deep%true|Only during water breaks%false|Yes, but only for sparkling water%false

column1: Can penguins fly if they believe hard enough?
column2: Only in motivational posters%false|Some researchers are still curious%true|Yes, straight into your heart%false
It grows on trees, so yes — let’s go with that%false|Only in dreams and food pyramids%false|Unfortunately, no%true
Only if it has cosmic pepperoni%false|No official answer from Area 51 yet%true|Yes, and they always order extra cheese%false

column1: Can your phone feel sad when you ignore it?
column2: Only if it's an iPhone%false|No one really knows how phones feel%true|Yes, it cries in low battery%false

column1: Do robots dream of electric sheep?
column2: That remains a philosophical mystery%true|Only when unplugged%false|Yes, and sometimes electric cows too%false
